Issue.creator: latitiah
Issue.summary: Negative Test: All admins from different orgs approve different the chaincode definitions
Issue.description: " on peer "peer0.org1.example.com" When an admin approves the chaincode package using policy "" on peer "peer0.org1.example.com" And an admin commits the chaincode package to the channel And a user invokes on the chaincode with args "init","a","1000","b","2000" on "peer0.org1.example.com" Then a user receives an error response containing "" from "peer0.org1.example.com" And a user invokes on the chaincode with args "init","a","1000","b","2000" on "peer0.org2.example.com" Then a user receives an error response containing "" from "peer0.org2.example.com" {code} >
